msgSnippet: The method summary, I would say.  This is true especially when I was studying JDK 1.4 and try to learn the new classes. Hmm...Maybe the IDE can come up with
messageBody:
The method summary, I would say. This is true especially when I was
studying JDK 1.4 and try to learn the new classes.

Hmm...Maybe the IDE can come up with something like that.

Mike Clark wrote:

>What information in the JavaDoc do you find more valuable: the class' intent and method signatures or the comments added for each method?
